name: Ion Deluge
summary: For the remainder of the turn, all Normal-type moves used by any Pokemon in the field become Electric-type, including status moves.
viability: Ion Deluge can make for some interesting effects in Doubles and Triples. For example, having a Pokemon like Manectric with Lightning Rod can force a move like Return or Hyper Voice to become Electric type, activating Lightning Rod. A lot of work, yes, but that's just an example of how it can work. You can also prevent normal moves on Ground types with this move.
